Test Name: Comprehensive Marfan, Loeys-Dietz, Ehlers-Danlos, and Aortopathy Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Patient specimen for genomic DNA extraction (typically whole blood)
Purpose: To identify genetic variants associated with Marfan, Loeys-Dietz, Ehlers-Danlos, and related aortopathy syndromes through next generation sequencing.
Container: Labeled specimen tube containing patient sample
Equipment: Automated DNA extractor, spectrophotometer, bioanalyzer, NGS sequencing machine (e.g., Illumina), high-performance computational server
